column2: Desilting, Rehabilitation of Tank Bund and Construction of Rip-rap
column3: Removal of silt should be done manually. Concrete bund should be repaired. Beneficiaries say that after the rehabilitation of this tank, water can be obtained for paddy cultivation of about 20. acres.
